mapper.insert: insert into tbl_studentInfo(studentid, studentname, address, cellphone, email) values(#{studentid},#{studentname},#{address}, #{cellphone}, #{email})
mapper.update: update tbl_studentInfo set studentname = #{studentname} ,address = #{address}, cellphone = #{cellphone}, email=#{email} where studentid=#{studentid}
mapper.select: select studentid, studentname, address, cellphone, email from tbl_studentInfo
